installing any trial/ evaluation software.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Portable by Vendor) is prohibited by default.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unsecure software\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees must not force attempts (bypass protection) to use any kind of malware blocked by antivirus, group policies or any other security systems implemented in EPAM, or not blocked yet but with clear understanding that software are not secure.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Malware: Virus, Trojans, Spyware, Worms, Ransomware, Adware,
